featured.text: I’ve tried all kinds of vegan “burgers,” and GreenBurgers are closer to what I’m looking for.

definition.zh_def: 一種以植物為基礎的漢堡，通常使用豆類、穀物或其他植物成分製作，旨在提供健康和環保的飲食選擇。
definition.en_def: A type of burger made primarily from plant-based ingredients, often using beans, grains, or other plant components, aimed at providing a healthy and environmentally friendly food option.
definition.example: Many people are choosing greenburgers as a delicious alternative to traditional meat burgers.
